m_szDocSumamry: dateText -------------------- Sunday, September 28, 2014  Monday, September 22, 2014  Monday, September 15, 2014  textArticle -------------------- Broader Perspective  Ideas from  Philosopher  , Economic Theorist,  Blockchain Scholar  ,  DIYbio Innovator  , and Startup Founder  Melanie Swan  regarding the hope and potentiality of our future  Sunday, September 28, 2014  Blockchain Health - Remunerative Health Data Commons & HealthCoin RFPs  The bigger concept behind cryptocurrencies like bitcoin is  blockchain technology  . The blockchain (a chain of transaction blocks) is a public transaction
